TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit NetworkInterface extends System.Object
public ref class NetworkInterface abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit NetworkInterface extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供网络接口的配置和统计信息。

span.span: Provides configuration and statistical information for a network interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类封装本地计算机上的网络接口（也称为适配器）的数据。This class encapsulates data for network interfaces, also known as adapters, on the local computer. 不创建此类的实例; 方法返回一个数组，该数组包含本地计算机上的每个网络接口的此类的一个实例。You do not create instances of this class; the method returns an array that contains one instance of this class for each network interface on the local computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示有关接口的信息。The following code example displays information about interfaces. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数只能由派生自类的类调用 。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Description As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); };
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Description As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the description of the interface.
A that describes this interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 说明是描述网络接口的用户可读文本。The description is human-readable text that describes the network interface. 说明中包含的信息取决于操作系统的功能。The information included in the description depends on the capabilities of the operating system. 在 Windows 上，它通常描述接口供应商、类型 (例如，以太网) 、品牌和型号。On Windows, it typically describes the interface vendor, type (for example, Ethernet), brand, and model. 在其他平台上，它可能与接口的名称一样简短，如 `eth0` 。On other platforms, it may be as brief as the name of the interface, such as `eth0`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例为本地计算机上的所有接口显示一个摘要。The following code example displays a summary for all interfaces on the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface[] GetAllNetworkInterfaces() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetAllNetworkInterfaces () As NetworkInterface()

summary.span: 返回描述本地计算机上的网络接口的对象。

span.span: Returns objects that describe the network interfaces on the local computer.

returns.span: 一个 数组，其中包含描述可用网络接口的对象，如果没有检测到接口，则为空数组。

span.span: A array that contains objects that describe the available network interfaces, or an empty array if no interfaces are detected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 计算机上的网络接口提供网络连接。The network interfaces on a computer provide network connectivity. 网络接口也称为网络适配器。Network interfaces are also known as network adapters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 (DNS) 本地计算机网络适配器的配置信息的域名服务。The following code example displays Domain Name Service (DNS) configuration information for the local computer's network adapters. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#41](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#41)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#41)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#41)]

exception.span: Windows 系统函数调用失败。

span.span: A Windows system function call failed.

summary.span: 返回描述此网络接口的配置的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that describes the configuration of this network interface.

returns.span: 对象，用于描述此网络接口。

span.span: An object that describes this network interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，此方法返回的对象中的信息反映了在创建数组时的接口。Note that the information in the object returned by this method reflects the interfaces as of the time the array is created. 此信息不会动态更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了支持 IPv4 的本地计算机网络适配器的信息。The following code example displays information for the local computer's network adapters that support IPv4. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

summary.span: 指示是否有任何可用的网络连接。

span.span: Indicates whether any network connection is available.

returns.span: 如果网络连接可用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a network connection is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何网络接口标记为 "up" 且不是环回或隧道接口，则认为网络连接可用。A network connection is considered to be available if any network interface is marked "up" and is not a loopback or tunnel interface.

Public Overridable Function GetPhysicalAddress () As PhysicalAddress

Public MustOverride Function GetPhysicalAddress () As PhysicalAddress

summary.span: 返回此适配器的媒体访问控制 (MAC) 或物理地址。

span.span: Returns the Media Access Control (MAC) or physical address for this adapter.

returns.span: 包含物理地址的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the physical address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的对象包含一个地址，该地址适合用于在数据链路层传输数据的介质。The object returned by this method contains an address that is appropriate to the media used to transport data at the data link layer. 例如，在以太网网络上，此方法返回以太网硬件地址。For example, on an Ethernet network, this method returns the Ethernet hardware address. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了本地计算机上所有接口的物理地址。The following code example displays the physical addresses of all interfaces on the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#51)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#51)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#51)]

summary.span: 获取 IPv6 环回接口的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the IPv6 loopback interface.
The index for the IPv6 loopback interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 IPv4 和 IPv6 环回接口，网络接口可能具有不同的接口索引。A network interface may have different interface indexes for the IPv4 and IPv6 loopback interface. P:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.IPv6LoopbackInterfaceIndex 属性仅返回 IPv6 环回接口。The P:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.IPv6LoopbackInterfaceIndex property only returns the IPv6 loopback interface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property LoopbackInterfaceIndex As Integer
public: static property int LoopbackInterfaceIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取 IPv4 环回接口的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the IPv4 loopback interface.

value.span: 一个包含 IPv4 环回接口的索引的 。

span.span: A that contains the index for the IPv4 loopback interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 环回接口的索引通常为1，但不能依赖于此。The index of the loopback interface is usually 1, but you cannot rely on this. 使用 属性可获取正确的值。Use the property to get the correct value. 对于 IPv4 和 IPv6 环回接口，网络接口可能具有不同的接口索引。A network interface may have different interface indexes for the IPv4 and IPv6 loopback interface. 属性只返回 IPv4 环回接口。The property only returns the IPv4 loopback interface.

exception.span: 此属性在仅运行 Ipv6 的计算机上无效。

span.span: This property is not valid on computers running only Ipv6.

[!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property NetworkInterfaceType As NetworkInterfaceType
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NetworkInterfaceType As NetworkInterfaceType

span.span: Gets the interface type.
An value that specifies the network interface type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举文档中详细介绍了接口类型 。The interface types are described in detail in the enumeration documentation. 原则上，此属性可以返回枚举的任何成员 。In principle, this property can return any member of the enumeration. 它返回的特定值取决于基础网络拓扑的运行时条件。The specific value that it does return is dependent on the runtime conditions of the underlying network topology. 这意味着：This means that: - 不可能事先确定属性为特定网络返回的值。It is not possible to determine in advance which value the property returns for a particular network. - 在某些情况下，在特定网络上，不能使用完整范围的枚举值。It is possible that in practice on a particular network, the full range of enumeration values is not available. 例如，在千兆以太网网络上，属性可以返回 而不是 。For example, on a gigabit Ethernet network, it is possible that the property returns rather than . ## Examples 下面的示例显示了本地计算机上所有接口的类型信息。The following example displays type information for all interfaces on the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#51)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#51)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#51)]

span.span: Gets the speed of the network interface.

value.span: 值，指定速度（每位/秒为单位）。

span.span: A value that specifies the speed in bits per second.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的值由网络接口报告。The value returned by this property is reported by the network interface. 不动态计算。It is not computed dynamically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在本地计算机上显示接口的速度。The following code example demonstrates displaying the speed of interfaces on the local computer. summary.span: 获取 值，该值指示是否启用网络接口以接收多播数据包。

value.span: 如果接口接收多路广播数据包，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the interface receives multicast packets; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多播是将数据包同时发送到多个目标的操作。Multicasting is the act of sending a data packet to multiple destinations simultaneously. ## Examples 下面的代码示例为本地计算机上的所有接口显示一个摘要。The following code example displays a summary for all interfaces on the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#51)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#51)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#51)]
